data.name: common/congratulation
data.value: Congratulations! You completed the mission and receive the following rewards

data.name: common/requirements
data.value: Available for completion in Tier IV vehicles or higher.

data.name: g1/advice
data.value: You can win the battle by destroying all enemy vehicles or capturing the enemy base. Be careful and do not rush ahead. Collaboration with your allies is key to avoiding destruction.

data.name: g1/description
data.value: Fulfilling the condition for 3 battles in a row is optional.

data.name: g1/name
data.value: Days of War

data.name: g10/advice
data.value: You can inflict huge damage regardless of your vehicle type. Choose targets that you can hit without fail, try to survive for as long as possible, and you will be pleasantly surprised by the "Damage caused" line on the Battle Results screen.

data.name: g10/description
data.value: Fulfilling the condition for 2 battles in a row is optional.

data.name: g10/name
data.value: Role Model: Damage

data.name: g2/advice
data.value: Heavy tanks have powerful guns and sturdy frontal armor that is hard to penetrate. However, this advantage is balanced by their poor maneuverability, which makes it easy to flank them and hit weak spots in the sides and rear.

data.name: g2/description
data.value: Results achieved in all battles in any vehicle are added together.

data.name: g2/name
data.value: Bull's Eye: Heavy Tanks

data.name: g3/advice
data.value: Medium tanks are versatile units that pursue a wide range of objectives on any battlefield—from covering main strike forces to performing flank attacks. Do not let them outflank you and destroy them while they are approaching.

data.name: g3/description
data.value: Results achieved in all battles in any vehicle are added together.

data.name: g3/name
data.value: Bull's Eye: Medium Tanks

data.name: g4/advice
data.value: Light tanks have weak armor and guns, but they compensate for this with excellent speed and concealment. The primary tasks for light tanks are spotting and distracting enemy vehicles.

data.name: g4/description
data.value: Results achieved in all battles in any vehicle are added together.

data.name: g4/name
data.value: Bull's Eye: Light Tanks

data.name: g5/advice
data.value: Tank destroyers are formidable opponents with heavy armament and excellent concealment, but—in most cases—mediocre maneuverability. Try to spot and destroy them as soon as possible.

data.name: g5/description
data.value: Results achieved in all battles in any vehicle are added together.

data.name: g5/name
data.value: Bull's Eye: Tank Destroyers

data.name: g6/advice
data.value: The fewer enemy vehicles left, the closer the victory. Act wisely, try to survive, and deal as much damage as possible. Use terrain to fire without exposing yourself.

data.name: g6/description
data.value: Results achieved in all battles in any vehicle are added together.

data.name: g6/name
data.value: Building a Collection

data.name: g7/advice
data.value: Every vehicle has internal and external modules and crew. Critical hits on them substantially reduce the battle performance of the enemy. Study vehicles' weak spots to be more effective in causing critical damage to enemy vehicles and hiding vulnerable points of your own vehicle.

data.name: g7/description
data.value: Results achieved in all battles in any vehicle are added together.

data.name: g7/name
data.value: Piercing Shots

data.name: g8/advice
data.value: One way to win a battle is to capture the enemy base. When enemy tanks are focused on fierce fighting, you can slip past them unnoticed and take the base. Remember that the more vehicles holding position within the base circle, the faster the capture. The maximum capture speed is achieved with 3 vehicles in the base circle.

data.name: g8/name
data.value: Backup Plan

data.name: g9/advice
data.value: You earn experience for spotting, causing damage and destroying enemy vehicles, capturing the enemy base, defending your base, and winning the battle.

data.name: g9/description
data.value: Fulfilling the condition for 2 battles in a row is optional.

data.name: g9/name
data.value: Role Model: Experience

data.name: group
data.value: Recruit Training
